name: MLPchan Namefield Pony Emoticons Pack
description:
An MLPchan pony emoticons pack, originally a simple modification of this one written for 4chan: 
http://userstyles.org/styles/85780/oneechan-emoji-pony-expansion-pack
And now with regular additions of icons by me!

Corrected by Legendary and Tom' for the site.
New ponies and icons updated by Tom'
additional_info:
Click "Install" and type the following in your email to get a matching icon next to your name (without " "s):
"Pinkie"
"Applejack"
"Fluttershy"
"Twilight"
"Rainbow"
"Rarity"
"Spike"

"Angel"
"Applebloom"
"Babs"
"Macintosh"
"Bonbon"

"Colgate"
"Derpy"
"Discord"
"Whooves"

"Luna"

"Octavia"
"Pinkamena"
"Rose"

"Shining" (Shining Armor)
"Spitfire"
"Surprise"
"Sweetie"
"Trixie"
"Vinyl"
"Zecora"

Mod icons:
"Lawny"
"Anonthony"
"Mellow"
"Filler"
"Macil"
"JokingJames"
"Starshine"
"Marcy"

v1.3:
- One icon was dedicated to each of the 8 mods, though everyone can use them, they are only accessible by entering their names or mod email. This is to give a bit of credit to their good work â™¥
- Added Granny Smith, Gummy, !!Rainbow Dash, !!Derpy, !!Trixie, !!Pinkie Pie, !!Spike

v1.21:
- Added an exception for someone's email
v1.2:
- Added Gilda, Lyra, Surprise, Spitfire, Angel, Cadance, Shining Armor, Pinkamena.
- Added Mellow, Littlepip.
v1.11:
- Added a fluffy pone!
v1.1:
- Added Babs Seed, Chrysalis, Discord and Octavia, home made icons.
- Fixed redundancies in the code
